title: the horse project, portland
name: the horse project, portland
description:
A Map by Laura1

Horses tied to horse rings in Portland Oregon.  Let's keep Portland weird!  Help us by setting out more horses.  Add your own locations or those you have found to the map.

properties.name: 2nd generation byways horse
properties.description: Posted by Jason outside byways cafe, nw glisan st, portland, ora lighter and brighter version has appeared.

properties.name: Aladdin Apache Pony
properties.description: Posted by Oskifan      3017 SE Milwaukie, Portland, orHe\'s a Livewire fan and enjoys long walks in Brooklyn neighborhood as well as frolicking at Brooklyn Park. Couldn\'t find any rings in Sellwood for his friends, though.

properties.name: Alberta Appoloosa
properties.description: Posted by Oskifan  1626 N.E. Alberta, Portland, OR

properties.name: American Dream Pizza
properties.description: Posted by System 4620 Northeast Glisan Street, Portland, OR, 97213American Dream Pizza 503-230-0699

properties.name: American Dream Steed
properties.description: Posted by Winkjunior4620 Northeast Glisan Street, Portland, OR, 97213At least two horses have been stolen from here, there was a cable tie, uncut, and then someone put in another using a ribbon tie, which was mangled and broken. I replaced it with another ribbon tie and this time glued the horse to the curb and the rubbon tie to the horse and the ribbon to the wire tie. Hopefully this one will last!

properties.name: Anna's Pony named Sal
properties.description: Posted by DsohigianA cute little Shetland Pony. This one is on a ring right next door to our house - we put it out with our neighbors permission. We can see it from our front window and I know that the kids going to school at Cedarwood will get a kick out of it. This is part of a project going on for the last year in Portland (http://horseproject.home.comcast.net/) and we thought we would do our part. Our neighbor grew up in our house (purchased in the 1930\'s) and she remembers a man coming to deliver vegetables with a horse and wagon and he would tie his horse to this very ring. A part of Portland\'s vibrant history.

properties.description: Posted by Winkjunior1432 SE 51st St., PortlandA doctor/friend of mine was so excited to learn about the Horse Project and find out more about the couple of horses she had seen on Belmont that I had to leave one just north of Hawthorne on SE 51st St. to brighten her days. This one can\'t decide whether to race one of the cars or the bicycle. I\'m betting on the horse no matter what.

properties.name: Horse Cops
properties.description: Posted by ParkerburnmillThis is where the real horses be. They bite, kick and charge your ass if your in the right place at the right time. I once saw a horse cop pummel and trample a crackhead under hoof for thirty seconds. Not a good scene.

properties.name: J&M Cafe Horse
properties.description: Posted by Winkjunior 538 Ash St., PortlandHere are pics of the original horse and her replacement. The first one confirmed what I had suspected - if the horses aren\'t glued to the curb and the tie is too long, they fall off the curb onto the street and get run over. So from now on, I\'m keep the wire ties as short sa I can and gluing their hooves with Goop - I think they\'ll last much much longer because I think the "horse thieves" are only a minor cause of missing horses.

Her motto: "Life is Lumpy!"

properties.name: PNCA Pony Backspace CyberGothGeek
properties.description: Posted by Twobeeshawn       This lil fella is in the bathroom of Backspace Cafe, you\'ll need to get a key, be brave! He needs something to wear to hang with the cool kids, can you hook him up?

properties.name: PNCA Pony Emile
properties.description: Posted by Twobeeshawn    Emile walks tall outside the Belmont Library, inside you can find lots of books about knitting, and perhaps make him something to wear!

properties.description: Posted by Twobeeshawn    Fast Runner lives outside of "Jam" and would like to look half as cool as the kids inside, knit him some gear!

Just like Elija the wooden Indian Head? Maybe a nice knit scarf would warm his frozen heart!

properties.name: PNCA Pony SUNSET

properties.name: PNCA Pony Starry Rose Will
properties.description: Posted by Twobeeshawn    This pony is easy like Sunday Mornings, but needs funky new threads, maybe you\'ll knit him something sweet.

properties.name: PNCA Pony TITO

properties.name: Pretty in Pink Pony
properties.description: Posted by FryingpantsI was walking to the Waypost on N Williams to get my afternoon coffee when I hapened upon this pretty pink pony looking so proud. I took its picture, and I wrote a little song for him. Maybe you can come up with melody to go with. [singing] My pretty pony Pretty pony He is a pink pony Not a brown cow He is a proud pony My pretty pony Pretty pink pony on the town!

properties.description: Posted by Oskifan    5800 NE Alameda, Portland, ORBill Clinton, Dick Cheney, GWB, Laura Bush, and Hillary Clinton all seem to agee on one thing. Presidents Rutherford B. Hayes and William McKinley were also Methodists.

properties.description: Posted by CivrotRescued Sparkles from the suburbs and brought her to the city.

properties.name: Stanton Street Steed
properties.description: Posted by Winkjunior4489 NE Stanton St., PortlandA My Little Pony was going to live here but a neighbor was walking by so we let her pick out the horse to live here. She promised to blow it kisses whenever she walks by and make sure it\'s standing up.

properties.name: Starbucks Saddle Horse
properties.description: Posted by Oskifan      4500 NE Glisan St, Portland, orHe is right at home hanging out with the locals who frequent Starbucks on Glisan. They requested a Roy Rogers, too, which I encouraged them to find and install.

properties.name: Stolen: Vito Horse 1, Vito Horse 2
properties.description: Posted by FlaurenVito has all these really exceptional plastic lawn and yard decor items. He was really excited about getting his horse, which was painted red to match the decorative rocks around his shrubs. He was most disappointed when horse #1 was stolen. We hope that horse #2 will last longer than 12 hours. Later: 12 hours seems to be the limit. I may try horse #3, or maybe this is destined to be Vito\'s Stolen Horse.

properties.name: Street Stallion
properties.description: Posted by Jason   NW 9th & Couch, PortlandThis little stallion has been standing guard on this corner for a few months now. He\'s tied to one of the old original horse ties that still adorn many parts of town. (my buddy is also making and installing his own new horse ties around the city, keep an eye out for them).

properties.name: The Alameda Horse #1
properties.description: Posted by Winkjunior4041 NE Alameda, PortlandHere\'s a horse someone put on Alameda. It doesn\'t have a wire rope tie, just twisted wire, but it\'s lasted. Will probably put a proper tie on it some time soonl, but good to know some neighborhoods are "safer" from them durned horse thieves!

properties.name: This 'N That Horse
properties.description: Posted by Doodlecat As part of my Oddities and Commodities Geocache, I have people find some horserings on Main St in Downtown Oregon City. Thanks to the horse project, I now have a horse attached to one of the rings. See waypoint GCMZYQ at www.geocaching.com

properties.name: This N' That Horse
properties.description: Posted by Doodlecat One of the steps to finding the Oddities and Commodities Geocache in Oregon City is to find these horserings. Now one of them actually has a horse attached! On Main Street. At geocaching.com, its waypoint GCMZYQ.

properties.description: Posted by JasonN Mississippi near Shaver, Portland, ORfound another one!! this one was wedged under the tire of a car, i yanked it out and set it back upright, as it deserves to be.

properties.name: Woodstock Library Horse
properties.description: Posted by Winkjunior6008 SE 49th Ave., PortlandThis horse got Rock Star Parking right in front of the Woodstock Multnomah Library! Hopefully a lot of kids will get to play with him.

properties.name: Woodstock Mystery Mare
properties.description: Posted by Winkjunior4640 SE Woodstock, PortlandThis mare is living near the infamous Woodstock Mystery Hole ("Just 2 Miles Off I-205!") and is dedicated to the always amazing Rev. Barron, curator of the Mystery Hole. She\'s helping keep an eye on the neighborhood and hoping to keep the new condos nearby from being too boring. Lots of love to you Rev. Barron!
